errors.error_description: In the 'Auto generation' section for adding a new exporter, step 2 incorrectly states that the environment variable file should be named `<exporter_name>.env` instead of the correct `<exporter_name>.default`.
correction_candidates: Create a file named `<exporter_name>.default` which will contain the default environment variables.
Create a file named `exporter.default` which will contain the default environment variables.
Create a file named `<exporter_name>.conf` which will contain the default environment variables.
Create a file named `default.vars` which will contain the default environment variables.
errors.golden_answer: Create a file named `<exporter_name>.default` which will contain the default environment variables.

errors.error_description: The command to build all packages is `make --all`, which is incorrect syntax for the make utility. It should be `make all`.
